title: [FEATURE] Rework the IgnorePixelScaling property
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently, the `IgnorePixelScaling` property works backwards. It draws the image and then scales it up.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
The property should create the large canvas, but then apply scaling so that further drawing operations are scaled automatically.

**Additional context**
Related: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/527
